New Records: David Peterson recorded 2.1 scoreless innings with 2 strikeouts in his MLB postseason debut
Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor hit a grand slam in the sixth inning with an exit velocity of 98.7 mph, driving in four runs
Milestones or significant achievements: The New York Mets advanced to the NLCS for the second consecutive season
Post-Match Reflections: The Mets' series victory marked a pivotal moment in their playoff push
